name: SurpriseYourLovedOne
0:
”Alexa ask everybody's opinion on who the cutest girl in the world is”
”Alexa ask everybody's opinion on Alex”
”Alexa ask everybody's opinion on who the coolest person in the world is”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: everybody's opinion
des:
This skill allows you to ask Alexa who the most (beautiful, cute, intelligent, etc.) person in the world is and will tell you that they are standing right next to you. It's a nice way to surprise someone special nearby! 

If they aren't standing next to you and you give Alexa a specific name, she will specifically state that "name" is simply the best, and no one could ever compare! 

Read the sample phrases to see how to invoke either responses.

I made this because my girlfriend and I keep getting into arguments over which one is cuter. I say she is and she say's that I am. I need Alexa to back me up. She's definitely cuter.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
